short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Survive the frozen world of Frostpunk 2 every time you open a new tab with this chilling live wallpaper! ❄️🔥🌍

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the dystopian future of Frostpunk 2, where survival in a world gripped by eternal winter is the ultimate challenge. This live wallpaper brings the harsh, frozen landscapes of the game to your Chrome new tab. With towering steam-powered cities and the ever-present frost, you'll feel the weight of your decisions as you watch the bleak beauty of this frozen world unfold before you. Whether you're a fan of the first game or eagerly awaiting the sequel, this wallpaper immerses you in the world of Frostpunk 2, where the battle for survival never ends.

Designed with both style and practicality in mind, this extension combines the chilling visuals of Frostpunk with the functionality you need for your everyday browsing experience.

Key Features
❄️ Frostpunk 2 Live Wallpaper: A haunting image of a frozen, steam-powered cityscape, capturing the desolate beauty of Frostpunk's world.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Seamlessly search the web while staying immersed in the icy landscape.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Keep track of time in a world where every second counts for survival.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Personalize your browser with easy access to your favorite websites.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Manage your extensions with ease using “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the lower left corner.
With the Frostpunk 2 Live Wallpaper, every new tab is a reminder of the difficult choices and chilling beauty of a world on the brink of collapse. Perfect for fans of survival games, strategy, and the fight against the cold.
